NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
COLEUS: The projection pool has been installed, Oeno! Now, we will be able to travel to this site easily for further inspections.
2
1
CYCAD: This space seems rather small, Coleus.. Will there be enough space for the warp receiver into the <color=orange>Sanctuary?</color>
3 2
OENO: That won't be a problem, Cycad! We won't be constructing a warp receiver to enter this structure.
4 3
CYCAD: But.. how will we enter this space to construct the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> then?
5 3
OENO: Haven't you heard, Cycad? We will be using <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop's</color> latest invention to enter the <color=orange>Sanctuary!</color>
6
5
COLEUS: Indeed. In fact, Daz has asked all of us to use his invention during the <color=orange>Sanctuary's</color> construction!
7
6
COLEUS: I cannot wait! We will be the first to truly test this new invention!
8
7
OENO: Cycad, you must visit the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> to learn more about Daz's invention when you can!
Campsite EX3 8
SY R4 8
Workshop R1 8
